title: Introduction
content: Welcome to the world of Tristan Nuvola. Here you'll find a collection of poetry and reflections.

title: About Tristan Nuvola
content: Tristan Nuvola is the pen name of Tim Nelson, a neurodivergent poet weaving clouds of words into intricate tapestries of emotion and thought.

title: Upcoming Book
content: Spectral Tapestry is currently in talks to get published, stay tuned for more info!

title: Contact
content: If you'd like to reach out, follow me on Patreon or connect through my social media channels.
